About.title: About Us
About.visionP1: At Oliyo AI Image Platform, we believe that everyone deserves to bring their creative visions to life. Our mission is to democratize access to powerful AI image generation and editing tools, making professional-level creative resources available to individuals, artists, designers, and businesses of all sizes.
About.visionP2: We're building a platform where imagination meets technology, enabling users to transform simple text prompts into stunning visuals in seconds.
About.techP1: We leverage cutting-edge artificial intelligence models including qwen-image-edit and gemini-flash-image to provide unparalleled image generation and editing capabilities. Our platform is built with performance, security, and ease of use in mind.
About.techP2: Our cloud-based infrastructure ensures fast processing times and scalable performance to handle your creative demands, whether you're generating a single image or bulk processing hundreds.
About.step1P: Create your account and receive 100 free credits to get started.
About.step2P: Enter a text prompt describing the image you want to create or edit.
About.step3P: Our AI models create or modify your image based on your prompt.
About.step4P: Download, share, or continue editing your generated images.
About.ctaP: Join thousands of creators who are bringing their ideas to life with our AI-powered platform.

Pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
Pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include access to our full suite of AI models.

GenerateImage.title: Generate Image
GenerateImage.promptPlaceholder: Describe the image you want to generate...
GenerateImage.enterPromptToSeePreview: Enter a prompt to see preview
GenerateImage.tipText: Be descriptive with your prompts for better results. For example: "A beautiful landscape with mountains and a lake at sunset, realistic style"

messages.initiated: Image generation initiated! Check back later to view your generated image.
messages.error: An error occurred while generating the image

EditImage.title: Edit Image
EditImage.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP. Max size: 50MB
EditImage.editPromptPlaceholder: Describe how you want to modify the image...
EditImage.editPromptExample: Example: "Make the sky more blue and add clouds"
EditImage.tips: Tip: Be specific with your edit prompts. For example: "Change the background to a beach scene" or "Add a hat to the person"

messages.initiated: Image editing initiated! Check back later to view your edited image.
messages.error: An error occurred while editing the image
messages.noImage: Please select an image to edit.
messages.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload a JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP image.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.responseTime: We typically respond within 24 hours on business days.
Contact.refundDetail: Refunds are considered for unused credits on a case-by-case basis.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.q: What if I'm not satisfied with the generated image?
items.a: You can regenerate with different prompts or edit it. We're constantly improving our AI models.

items.q: Do you offer refunds for purchased credits?
items.a: We offer refunds on a case-by-case basis for unused credits. Please contact support.

FAQ.moreHelp: Need more help? Contact our support team.
